ValidationRule.description: When UI Type = Multi-Select Picklist, Query Condition must contain the {0} symbol
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Setup.cgcloud__Validation_Rules_Setting__c.cgcloud__Bypass_Validation__c = FALSE, ISPICKVAL( cgcloud__UI_Type__c, 'Multi-Select Picklist') && FIND('{0}', cgcloud__Query_Condition__c ) = 0 )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Query Condition must contain the {0} input symbol for filter whose UI Type is a Multi-Select Picklist.
